What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Health > Diet&Fitness > Resolved Question Johann Member since: January 26, 2008 Total points: 125 (Level 1) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » Try to answer these 4 question i will give you about Eating and Weight Issues. Good Luck.? 1) Obesity is a disease that affects nearly one-third of the adult American population (approximately 60 million). Today, 64.5 percent of adult Americans (about 127 million) are categorized as being overweight or obese. (true, false)
2) To help herself feel better, Kara visits the local fast food restaurant after having a fight with her mother. She orders 3 burgers, a large order of fries, 2 apple pies a chocolate shake and a large Coke. Which eating disorder could Kara be suffering from? (anorexia nervosa, bulimia, binge eating,starvation)
3) Which of the following is not a symptom of anorexia nervosa?
refusal to maintain normal body weight for age and height
weight at 85% or less than expected for age and height
intense fear of weight gain
or
repeated episodes of bingeing and purging.
4) Which of the following is not a contribution to anorexia nervosa?
personal feelings
stress
genetics
culture
all are contributors 5 years ago Report Abuse by spartans... Member since: December 10, 2007 Total points: 1,032 (Level 3) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker 1) true 2)binge eating 3)repeated episode s of binge eating and purging 4) all of the above 5 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: Good Job! you got it all correct. Action Bar: 1 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo! Add to Del.icio.us RSS
